items.title: In a blatant act of voter intimidation in Georgia, a...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

In a blatant act of voter intimidation in Georgia, a representative from the Secretary of State showed up at a precinct in a predominantly African-American district. State House Representative Bee Nguyen reports that the rep, wearing a gun on his hip, forced poll workers to remove all food and water from the location.

From the LIVE Liberation News election coverage. Follow here: https://www.liberationnews.org/election-day-live-coverage/

Liberation News writers will be bringing you up-to-the-minute reporting on the election from a socialist perspective

items.title: Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverBreakThrough News is live now.When it comes to the 2020 US elections, everyone is talking about...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverBreakThrough News is live now.

When it comes to the 2020 US elections, everyone is talking about chaos. Will it come to that? What if neither candidate refuses to recognize the results or one... declares victory before the votes are counted?

In whatever scenario, there is little doubt that a new era of struggle is coming. BreakThrough's hosts will be joined by Abby Martin, Jill Stein, Gloria La Riva, Jodi Dean and Jared Ball to discuss what happens next and what the results mean for the people's movements.

See More

items.title: Incredible work by the Dallas branch in the housing struggle....
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Incredible work by the Dallas branch in the housing struggle. Organizers successfully stopped an eviction and are building real tenant power!

"Apartment tenants in Dallas, working with the coalition Dallas Stops Evictions have served their landlords with a list of 24 demands to be met by mid-November. The tenants of Estelle Village apartments are calling for ceased evictions per the CDC moratorium, an end to restrictions on parking in the complex, and an end to harassment by private security, to name a few demands.

Just a few months before, DSE and the residents of Estara apartments in far east Dallas successfully stopped an eviction, provided tenants with paperwork and court support, and connected tenants to facilitate further organizing in their complex."

items.title: Sign the petition! Former Black Panther Jalil Muntaqim was...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Sign the petition! Former Black Panther Jalil Muntaqim was arrested Friday and is facing re-imprisonment for filling out a voter registration form. Jalil was just released last month after being unjustly imprisoned for 49 years.

The carceral state is relentless. After 49 years caged, Jalil Muntaqim‚Äôs freedom is in jeopardy after completing a voter registration form. Mr. Muntaqim's family and community who know, honor and love their educated, respected and courageous elder, say NO!

items.title: Spotted in Denver! #LaRiva2020 #VoteSocialist Small businesses...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Spotted in Denver! #LaRiva2020 #VoteSocialist

Small businesses are struggling to stay afloat during this pandemic, and neither capitalist candidate is offering the kind of expansive relief program that will actually get people through this crisis. Gloria La Riva and the PSL are fighting for the things that working people in this country need: rent and mortgage cancellation, mass covid-testing, guaranteed income during the pandemic, free healthcare for all.

#VoteSocialist2020 ...and join us in the fight beyond the elections to advance the interests of working and oppressed people in this country.

If you want a Gloria La Riva 2020 yard sign, call 720-530-9167.

items.title: Yesterday afternoon in West Philadelphia, 27-year-old Walter...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Yesterday afternoon in West Philadelphia, 27-year-old Walter Wallace Jr. was murdered by Philadelphia police in front of his parents. Protestors, including PSL members, gathered last night near the scene in Cobbs Creek while police barricaded entire sections of West Philadelphia. There is a mass action planned for tonight at Malcom X Park in Philly.

The people will continue the struggle until white supremacist police terror ends!

Justice for Walter Wallace Jr!

items.title: Amy Coney Barrett, an arch-reactionary, anti-LGBTQ,...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Amy Coney Barrett, an arch-reactionary, anti-LGBTQ, anti-abortion bigot, has been confirmed to the Supreme Court, solidifying the extreme right-wing majority of the court.

Democrats approved Barrett without a fight in less than three months, just a week before a presidential election. Biden said Barrett was "a very fine person" and that he was "not opposed" to her nomination. The Democratic party has once again demonstrated that it does not intend to mount any real oppositio...n to reactionaries and their policies.

In truth, the Supreme Court has been one of the most consistently reactionary institutions of the United States. The Supreme Court exists to limit the democratic process in the interests of the ruling class. It ensures, for example, that no democratically elected Congress could ever pass a law that infringes on the right of the rich to own their wealth. We recommend reading "The Supreme Court: last line of defense for the ruling class" (linked in comments) for more analysis of the class character of the Supreme Court.

The system we live under does not offer real democracy to working and oppressed people. We need a system in which our interests are actually represented in our government. This is why we fight for socialism.

See More

items.title: DROP ALL THE CHARGES ON ANTI-RACIST ORGANIZERS IN THE DENVER...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

DROP ALL THE CHARGES ON ANTI-RACIST ORGANIZERS IN THE DENVER AREA! - HOW YOU CAN HELP

On Sept. 17, police agencies in the Denver area arrested anti-racist organizers in a coordinated assault. People were arrested in a Home Depot parking lot, at their homes, and after they were pulled over while driving. Those arrested were the leaders to demand justice for Elijah McClain, who was brutally murdered by the Aurora Police Department. They are still in jail, with the exception of ...one person. They are facing multiple felony charges and years in prison in an obvious frame-up aimed at stopping the movement for justice for Elijah McClain.

Add your name to sign the petition and join the campaign to demand that all the charges be dropped!

Petition text:

"I demand that all charges be dropped on anti-racist organizers in the Denver area. It is an obvious political frame-up aimed at stopping the movement for justice for Elijah McClain."

You can also donate for legal and political support for the PSL organizers who were arrested: pslweb.org/donate4denver

If you are a community leader or a member of an organization you can sign our solidarity statement: pslweb.org/denverorgsolidarity

If you can support in person, you can join our emergency demonstration demanding the dropping off all charges: https://facebook.com/events/s/dropthechargesco-march-and-ral/775179416359489/?ti=icl
